page.title: 06RELIGION _ The Church Tower
page.content: { The church tower}needs constant repair as its frame is very weak. The worn spiral stairs are made of concrete. The church has just bought a new weather vane. There are six bells altogether and they are made of bell metal. The oldest bell was made in the 16th century. Bell ringing practises are held on Tuesday night and the bells are rung on Sunday and at weddings. The bells can be rung by a group or by one person because of a box with little strings leading to the bells. You do not get the full effect but it is sometimes useful. The bells are designed so that four swing one way and two swing the other. This is so that the tower does not rock. The old clock cannot be relied on to chime regularly. It chimes on one of the bells but it is a totally different mechanism from the bells.
